Renaming Version Labels

Rename a version label when you want to change an existing version label. You can rename version labels individually, at the project level, folder level, or project database level. When renaming version labels at the project, folder, or project database level, all of the version labels that match the version label you want to change will be changed.

To rename a version label:

  1. Select the files, projects, folders, or project database that contains the version label you want to change.

  2. Select Actions | Version Label | Rename. The Rename Version Label dialog box appears.

  3. Enter the version label that you want to rename in the Rename From field.

  4. Enter the new version label in the To field.

  5. To rename version labels in files within subprojects of the selected project or project database, select the Include Files in Subprojects check box.

  6. Click OK.
